TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Timeline extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public MustInherit Class Timeline Inherits Animatable

summary.span: 定义一个时间段。

span.span: Defines a segment of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间线表示时间的段。A timeline represents a segment of time. 它提供的属性让你可以指定该时间段的长度、开始时间、重复次数、该时间段内时间进度的快慢等。It provides properties that enable you to specify the length of that segment, when it should start, how many times it will repeat, how fast time progresses in that segment, and more. 从时间线类继承的类可提供附加功能，例如动画和媒体播放。Classes that inherit from the timeline class provide additional functionality, such as animation and media playback. 以下是一些可用的专用时间线的不同类型的示例。The following are examples of some of the different types of specialized timelines available. - **动画**:是一种生成输出值的时间线。**Animations**: An is a type of timeline that produces output values. 当你将与属性关联动画时，动画将更新属性的值，它播放时，从而"进行动画处理"。When you associate an animation with a property, the animation updates the property's value as it plays, thereby "animating" it. 动画的简介，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For an introduction to animations, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 有关应用动画的不同方法的信息，请参阅[属性动画技术概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md)。For information about the different ways to apply animations, see the [Property Animation Techniques Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md). - **MediaTimelines**: A是一种控制播放的媒体文件的时间线。**MediaTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that controls the playback of a media file. - **ParallelTimelines**: A是一种分组其他时间线的时间线。**ParallelTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that groups other timelines. - **情节提要**: A是一种特殊的提供对象和属性目标的时间线，它包含的信息。**Storyboards**: A is a special type of that provides object and property targeting information for the timelines it contains. 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 有关使用时间线详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about using timelines, see the [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 时间线的时间的计时功能的介绍，请参阅[计时行为概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md)。For an introduction to the timing features of timelines, see the [Timing Behaviors Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md). ## 数据绑定和动画时间线Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大多数时间线属性可以是数据绑定，或进行动画处理;但是，由于计时系统的方法，不执行操作的绑定或动画时间线行为类似于其他数据的数据绑定，或进行动画处理的对象。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解其行为，它有助于了解一下激活时间线的含义。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 时间线应用时，将制作时间线及其子时间线的副本。When a timeline is applied, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 这些副本已冻结 （使其只读的） 和从中创建对象。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 它是这些时钟将执行对目标的属性进行动画处理的实际工作。It's these clocks that do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果时间线为数据绑定或进行动画处理，其当前值的快照已创建其时钟时。If a timeline was data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values was made when its clock was created. 即使原始时间线可能继续更改，其时钟却没有。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 时间线以反映数据绑定或动画更改，必须重新生成其时钟。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be regenerated. 时钟不会自动重新生成。Clocks are not regenerated for you automatically. 以下是应用时间线更改的几种方法：The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果时间线或属于，你可以通过重新应用其情节提要使用反映更改或方法。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 这还会产生重新启动动画的附带影响。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在代码中，你可以使用方法向前移动情节提要重新为其以前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果你将动画应用于属性使用直接方法中，调用再次方法并将其传递已修改的动画。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that's been modified. - 如果要直接在时钟级别上工作，请创建并应用一组新的时钟，然后用它们替换之前生成的一组时钟。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of generated clocks. 有关数据的一个示例绑定动画，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see the [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) . ## 作为计时器使用时间线Using a Timeline as a Timer 没有与之关联的事件处理程序时，才会前进时间线的时钟或 (对于对象) 是与属性相关联。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 此原因 （和其他内容），不建议你使用作为计时器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double AccelerationRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在将时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率过程中所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 一个介于 0 和 1 之间的值（包括 0 和 1），用于指定在将时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率过程中所占用时间线的 的百分比。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 如果同时设置时间线的 属性，则 和 之和必须小于等于 1。

span.span: If the timeline's property is also set, the sum of and must be less than or equal to 1.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来创建动画启动缓慢，然后随着时间的推移加快。Use the property to create animations that start slowly and then speed up as time progresses. 属性可用于创建渐入效果或使看上去更自然的移动。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用和属性在一起以创建开始缓慢、 的动画，提高速度，然后在完成之前再次变慢。Use the and properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 1.
The sum of and exceeds 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法，不应直接由你的代码调用。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly by your code.

span.para: 实现者具有相应的自定义时钟，应与类一起使用时应重写此方法。重写的方法应创建并返回继承自的类的新实例。

Implementers of should override this method when it has a corresponding custom clock that should be used with the class. The overridden method should create and return a new instance of class that inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoReverse { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoReverse : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示时间线在完成向前迭代后是否按相反的顺序播放。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timeline plays in reverse after it completes a forward iteration.

value.span: 如果时间线在每次迭代结束时按相反的顺序播放，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the timeline plays in reverse at the end of each iteration; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，时间线播放指定的时间长度的两倍的其属性。If the property is set to `true`, the timeline plays for twice the length of time specified by its property. ### AutoReverse 和重复AutoReverse and Repetitions 当时间线的属性设置为`true`及其属性使其重复播放，每个向前迭代后跟一个向后迭代。When a timeline's property is set to `true` and its property causes it to repeat, each forward iteration is followed by a backward iteration. 这样一次重复。This makes one repetition. 例如，时间线与值`true`与迭代的 2 将向前播放一次，然后向后，再次，然后转发，然后再次向后。For example, a timeline with an value of `true` with an iteration of 2 would play forward once, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty AutoReverseProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly AutoReverseProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property BeginTime As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> BeginTime { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.BeginTime : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 应开始的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time at which this should begin.

value.span: 相对于其父级的 ，此 应开始的时间。

span.span: The time at which this should begin, relative to its parent's .

value.span: 如果此时间线为根时间线，则该时间相对于其交互开始时间（触发时间线的时刻）。

span.span: If this timeline is a root timeline, the time is relative to its interactive begin time (the moment at which the timeline was triggered).

value.span: 此值可能为正数、负数或 ； 值表示永远不会播放该时间线。

span.span: This value may be positive, negative, or ; a value means the timeline never plays.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于创建序列中的播放的时间线： 通过增加可以共享同一个父的连续时间线，错开它们的播放时间。The property is useful for creating timelines that play in a sequence: by increasing the of successive timelines that share the same parent, you can stagger their play times. ## 负值Negative Values 负值使表现得像它在过去的某个时刻启动。A negative value causes a to behave as though it started at some time in the past. 例如，与的负 2.5 秒和的 5 秒看起来处于半方式开始就已完成。For example, a with a of negative 2.5 seconds and a of 5 seconds will appear to be half-way finished when it starts. ## BeginTime 和 SpeedRatioBeginTime and SpeedRatio 所描述的时间属性按时间线的父级的时间计算。The time described by the property is measured in the timeline's parent's time. 例如，时间线与的其父代具有的 5 2 的实际开始 2.5 秒后。For example, a timeline with a of 5 whose parent has a of 2 actually starts after 2.5 seconds. 时间线的自己设置不影响其。A timeline's own setting does not affect its . 例如，时间线与为 5 秒， 2 和父时间线的5 秒，不是 2.5 之后启动的 1。For example, a timeline with a of 5 seconds, a of 2, and a parent timeline with a of 1 starts after 5 seconds, not 2.5. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*对象* ="[-] [*天*。]*小时*:*分钟*:*秒*[。*秒的小数部分*]"/ >\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> \- 或 -\- or - \<*对象* ="[-] [*天*。]*小时*:*分钟*"/ >\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> \- 或 -\- or - \<*object* ="[-]*days*"/>\<*object* ="[-]*days*"/> \- 或 -\- or - \<*对象* ="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >\<*object* ="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values 方括号中的项 (`[`和`]`) 都是可选的。Items in square brackets (`[` and `]`) are optional. *天**days* 一个值大于或等于 0，用于描述跨越此天数开始时间。A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this begin time. *小时数**hours* 一个介于 0 和 23 之间的值，表示此跨越的小时数开始时间。A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this begin time. *分钟**minutes* 一个介于 0 和 59 之间的值，表示此跨越的分钟数开始时间。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this begin time. *秒**seconds* 一个介于 0 和 59 之间的值，表示此跨越的秒数开始时间。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this begin time. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 一个包含 1 至 7 位值，表示秒的小数部分。A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds. 有关完整语法，请参阅备注部分的页。For the complete syntax, see the Remarks section of the page. ## Examples 时间线的属性确定时间线的活动期开始。A timeline's property determines the beginning of a timeline's active period. 如果时间线具有父时间线，属性确定所需时间线来启动其父级启动后多长时间。If the timeline has a parent timeline, the property determines how long it takes the timeline to start after its parent starts. 如果时间线为根时间线 ( ，例如)，则属性确定时间线所需的时间开始播放后触发它时。If the timeline is a root timeline (a , for example), the property determines how long the timeline takes to start playing after it is triggered. 下面的示例演示具有不同的几个不同时间线设置。The following example shows several different timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_BeginTimeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/BeginTimeExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_begintimeexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

summary.span: 创建此 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为 。

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: 当此时间线完全播放完毕时发生：它将不再进入其活动周期。

span.span: Occurs when this timeline has completely finished playing: it will no longer enter its active period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此时间线的时间线树根时间线，它已完成播放后到达其有效期 （其中包括重复） 结尾，并且所有子项具有都达到其活动周期的结尾。If this timeline is the root timeline of a timeline tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active period (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active periods. 如果此时间线为子时间线，它被视为完全完成播放时其所属达到的时间线树的根时间线活动期和所有子时间线的末尾具有播放完毕的信息。If this timeline is a child timeline, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root timeline of the timeline tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active period and all its child timelines have finished playing. 停止时间线不会触发其已完成的事件，但正在到其填充期间跳过它。Stopping a timeline does not trigger its completed event, but skipping it to its fill period does. 参数事件处理程序是时间线的。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册为此时间线创建。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，两个对象用于创建两个映像，使用存储之间的动画过渡对象，并显示使用控件。In the following example, two objects are used to create an animation transition between two images, stored using objects and displayed using an control. 一个情节提要收缩图像控件，直到它消失。One storyboard shrinks the image control until it disappears. 其完成后，旧后替换为另，和第二个的情节提要展开图像控件，直到它是全尺寸试。After it completes, the old is swapped with the other , and a second storyboard that expands the image control until it is full-sized again. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#TimelineCompletedExampleMarkupUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/TimelineCompletedExample.xaml#timelinecompletedexamplemarkupusingwholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在时间线时钟的时间前进速率发生变化时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the rate at which time progresses for the timeline's clock changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下情况下的时间线的时钟更改当前全局速度：The current global speed of a timeline's clock changes in the following circumstances: - 时钟由于其时间线的更改方向设置。The clock changes direction because of its timeline's setting. - 时钟而加速或由于其时间线的减速或属性设置。The clock accelerates or decelerates because of its timeline's or property settings. - 时钟连接而暂停或恢复。The clock is paused or resumed. - 时钟变为非活动状态，或重新激活。The clock becomes inactive or reactivates. - 的时钟的父更改之一。The of one of the clock's parent changes. 事件可用于跟踪在时间线的时钟变为暂停时; 在事件处理程序，请使用你的情节提要方法或检查时钟属性来确定是否已暂停其时钟，则将对此进行比较要确定是否它更改以前缓存的值。The event is useful for tracking when a timeline's clock becomes paused; in your event handler, use your storyboard's method or check the clock's property to determine whether its clock is paused; compare this against a previously cached value to determine whether it changed. 参数事件处理程序是时间线的。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册为此时间线创建。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何注册以进行事件。The following example shows how to register for the event. [!code-csharp[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/CSharp/TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExample.cs#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/visualbasic/timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexample.vb#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 更新时间线的 的 属性时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the timeline's is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件时想要被通知时时间线的启动、 停止或填充。Use the event when you want to be notified when a timeline's starts, stops, or fills. 暂停不会更改其。Pausing a does not change its . 若要要得到通知时钟变为暂停时，使用事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 虽然此事件发生时变为无效，并不一定意味着更改：用于从切换到和再转回在同一个计时周期将导致此事件激发，但其属性不会实际更改。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change. 参数事件处理程序是创建为此时间线。The parameter of the event handler is the that was created for this timeline. 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册为此时间线创建。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来创建该在停止前减速的动画。Use the property to create animations that slow down before stopping. 属性可用于创建渐入效果或使看上去更自然的移动。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用和属性在一起以创建开始缓慢、 的动画，提高速度，然后在完成之前再次变慢。Use the and properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置此时间线播放的时间长度，而不是计数重复。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time for which this timeline plays, not counting repetitions.

value.span: 时间线的简单持续时间：此时间线完成一次向前迭代所花费的时间。

span.span: The timeline's simple duration: the amount of time this timeline takes to complete a single forward iteration.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 时间线的简单持续时间构成一次的向前迭代，而不是总播放时间，其中包括重复的时间。A timeline's simple duration constitutes the time for a single forward iteration versus the total play time, which includes repetitions. ## 默认持续时间行为Default Duration Behavior 行为值为结构取决于时间线的类型：The behavior of a structure with a value of depends on the type of timeline: |**时间线****Timeline**|**行为****Behavior**| |-|-| ||无法确定 (为抽象类)Undetermined ( is abstract)| |,,

,,

|扩展以容纳子时间线Expands to fit child timelines| |\<*类型*> 动画 （称为"从/到/者"或"基本"动画）\<*Type*>Animation (Known as a "From/To/By" or "basic" animations)|1 秒1 second| |\<*类型*> AnimationUsingKeyFrames （称为关键帧动画）\<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames (Known as key frame animations)|所有关键帧的总和值Sum of all key frame values| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 和类型的对象。 and are types of objects. 持续时间由其子时间线的持续时间。The duration of a is determined by the duration of its child timelines. 例如，下面会为六秒 （持续时间为 6 秒），因为它是当其最后一个子级时间线 () 结束。For example, the below will run for six seconds (duration of 6 seconds) because that is when its last child Timeline () ends. > [!NOTE] > 注意： 以下示例中，仅用于说明提供从，代码已被省略。Note: code has been omitted from the following examples, which are provided for illustrative purposed only. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` 示例\<*类型*> 动画包括， ， ，等等。如果没有指定为这些类型的动画，则会为 1 秒。Examples of \<*Type*>Animations include , , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations, they will run for one second. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` 示例\<*类型*> AnimationUsingKeyFrames 包括， ，等等。如果没有指定为这些类型的所有关键帧都完成后将运行它们的动画。Examples of \<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames include , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations they will run until all key frames are finished. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 在活动周期结束后的行为方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the behaves after it reaches the end of its active period.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定时间线在到达其有效期末尾后但其父级仍处于其有效期或填充期时的行为表现。

span.span: A value that specifies how the timeline behaves after it reaches the end of its active period but its parent is inside its active or fill period.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置动画属性如果想要保留其值，它到达其有效期末尾后的动画。Set an animations property to when you want the animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period. 已达到其有效期末尾的动画设置被认为是在其填充期间。An animation that has reached the end of its active period that has a setting of is said to be in its fill period. 如果不希望保留后的其值的动画它到达其有效期末尾时，设置其When you don't want an animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period, set its 属性设置为。 property to . 因为动画在其填充期间继续重写其目标属性的值，尝试设置通过其他方式的目标属性的值可能会不产生任何影响。Because an animation in its fill period continues to override its target property's value, attempting to set the target property's value through other means might appear to have no effect. 有关演示如何设置属性值进行动画处理后的示例，请参阅[如何： 设置属性后进行动画处理其与情节提要](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md)。For an example showing how to set a property value after it has been animated, see [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md). 播放和填充其父时间线停止; 时，子时间线将停止如果你想子时间线，以填充，请确保其父时间线具有的。A child timeline stops playing and filling when its parent timeline stops; if you want a child timeline to fill, make sure its parent timeline has a of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

returns.span: 如果 为 false，则该方法将在该实例目前为只读的情况下返回 ，而在其他情况下返回 ，并且其副作用是已开始更改该对象的冻结状态。

span.span: If is false, this method returns if this instance is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿调用此方法，直接 （但调用基实现中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by .

span.para: 当类包含不存储使用依赖项属性的数据时，实施者必须重写此方法。典型实现应调用基类，然后调用静态方法对所有类型的类包含，返回的属性仅当所有属性都被冻结 （或可能已被冻结，对于传递通过值)。

implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties. A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时，仅应调用此方法属性设置为。This method should only be called when the property is set to . 如果是，自然持续时间由该特定类的实现。If is , the natural duration is determined by that particular class's implementation of . 如果返回，则意味着自然持续时间是未知，这表示自然持续时间为。If returns , it means that the natural duration is unknown, which implies a natural duration of . 此类是用于流式处理媒体这种情况。Such is the case for streaming media. 请注意，传递此时间线创建以外的时钟的此方法是可行的但将提供不可靠的结果。Note that passing this method a clock other than the one that was created for this timeline is possible, but will provide unreliable results.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RemoveRequested As EventHandler

summary.span: 当移除为此时间线创建的时钟或其中一个父时间线时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock created for this timeline or one of its parent timelines is removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过应用引发此事件操作到使用情节提要的情节提要方法，或 （当直接处理时钟） 调用方法。This event is raised by applying a action to a storyboard, using a Storyboard's method, or (when working directly with clocks) calling the method. 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册为此时间线创建。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior RepeatBehavior { System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此时间线的重复行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the repeating behavior of this timeline.

value.span: 一个迭代 ，指定时间线将要播放的次数；一个 值，指定此时间线活动周期的总长度；或者特殊值 ，指定时间线应该无限重复。

span.span: An iteration that specifies the number of times the timeline should play, a value that specifies the total the length of this timeline's active period, or the special value , which specifies that the timeline should repeat indefinitely.

value.span: 默认值是与的1，指示时间线播放一次。

span.span: The default value is a with a of 1, which indicates that the timeline plays once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果迭代指定的时间线属性设置为`true`，一次重复组成一个向前迭代和向后的一次迭代。If an iteration is specified and the timeline's property is set to `true`, a single repetition consists of one forward iteration and one backward iteration. 时间线属性设置为 true 迭代的 2 将播放向前，然后向后，再次，然后转发，然后再次向后。A timeline with an property set to true an iteration of 2 would play forwards, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. 而不是指定的时间线播放的次数，还可以指定时间线要播放的时间的总的长度。Instead of specifying the number of times a timeline plays, you can also specify the total length of time you want the timeline to play. 时间线来重复，这对于值应大于时间线的。For a timeline to repeat, this value should be greater than the timeline's . 例如，时间线与的 2 秒和的 4 秒，将播放一两次。For example, a timeline with a of 2 seconds and a of 4 seconds will play twice. 如果小于时间线的，时间线的活动期被中止。If the is less than the timeline's , the timeline's active period is cut short. 有关重复时间线详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about repeating timelines, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的时间相对于其父级的前进速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate, relative to its parent, at which time progresses for this .

value.span: 一个大于 0 的有限值，表示此时间线的时间相对于其父级的前进速率；如果此时间线为根时间线，则为默认时间线速度。

span.span: A finite value greater than 0 that describes the rate at which time progresses for this timeline, relative to the speed of the timeline's parent or, if this is a root timeline, the default timeline speed.

value.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时间线的设置没有影响其; 该时间是相对于时间线的父级或如果时间线为根时间线，从该处开始时间线的时钟时间。A timeline's setting does not have an effect on its ; that time is relative to the timeline's parent or, if the timeline is a root timeline, the moment at which the timeline's clock was begun. 如果或指定，这平均比率高于自然长度的时间线。If or are specified, this is the average ratio over the natural length of the timeline. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 时间线的属性控制自己的进度，相对于其父级的速率。A timeline's property controls its rate of progress, relative to its parent. 如果时间线为根，其相对于默认时间线速度。If the timeline is a root, its is relative to the default timeline speed. 下面的示例演示几个具有不同的时间线设置。The following example shows several timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_SpeedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/SpeedExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_speedexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 小于 0 或并非有限值。

span.span: is less than 0 or is not a finite value.
